item.title: About me
item.author: mouniprathi@outlook.com (Mouni Prathi)
item.description:
• About Me 🙋

✔️ 12 years of Total IT Experience. Seasoned SRE with high performance applications and databases support.
✔️ Site Reliability Engineer with Speciality in Databases and Data Engineering products for lighting fast reporting.
✔️ Application Design, Performance, Troubleshooting. Microservices, Cloud, Onprem, Edge computing, Contenarization and Datalakes.
✔️ Event Driven Automation, Scripting, Monitoring.
📧 DM me on Linkedin

  • Hobbies:

Video games 🕹️ Hiking! ⛰️ Camping ⛺ Reading 📖 MotorCycling 🏍️
